title: Dawn Bringer Riven should be the updated Kayle.
body:
The flowing/moving wings/cape on Dawn Bringer Riven should replace Kayle's stiff wings. The ULT where Riven transforms into a godly being, should be Kayle's ULT. The gold bubble is old and meh. How cool would it be if Kayle's ULT brought out the 'god' form of every champ or Kayle for a few secs when used. It might be a lot of work, but well worth it. I'm not even a Kayle main... or a Kayle player really. So not really biased. But I look at this new Riven skin... which I think is cool and amazing. Then I think... you know who this would of gone better on... who this -really- looks like? It looks like an updated Kayle, not Riven. Just my thoughts. Love you Riot. But you might of missed an opportunity here.

(Lastly I can't post in the right board due to my 'level'. Sorry. )

replies.body:
this would mean what? 136 models for 1 champ + skin versions.

i don't think wings even move like a cape. 

She looks like an divine sure but not like an angel even though it was originally called angelblade. 

Kayle should look like an angel warrior anyway imo, het current armor is actually really cool. The gold bubble is kinda her thing tho, it should just resemble the one in her splash art more.

Kayle definitely needs a rework and has some serious potential.

The risk is riot would probably lock her into one role, most likely a tank top/support like tahm kench or nautilus.
considering her main playstyle right now is onhit ap i don't think they'd change her into a tank.
